mapper.insert: insert into tbmember (email,membername,celltel,password,businessname,businessnumber,licensegrade,companyphone,emailcertificationyn,withdrawalyn,withdrawaldate,joindate,createdAt,updatedBy,updatedAt) values (#{email}, #{membername}, #{celltel}, sha2(#{password}, 256), #{businessname}, #{businessnumber}, #{licensegrade}, #{companyphone}, #{emailcertificationyn}, #{withdrawalyn}, #{withdrawaldate}, #{joindate}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now())

insert into tbtaxinformation (taxid, email, Representationname, taxcompanynumber, taxemail, postnumber, address, detailaddress, businesscondition, businesskind, settlementmeans, baseamount, createdAt, updatedBy, updatedAt) values (uuid(), #{email}, #{representationname}, #{taxcompanynumber}, #{taxemail}, #{postnumber}, #{address}, #{detailaddress}, #{businesscondition}, #{businesskind}, #{settlementmeans}, #{baseamount}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now())
insert into tbauthentication (authenticationid, email, agreeyn, createdAt) values (uuid(), #{email}, #{agreeyn}, now())
mapper.select: select * from tbmember where email=#{uid} and password=sha2(#{upw}, 256) and emailcertificationyn = 1 and withdrawalyn != '1'
mapper.update: update tbmember set sessionkey = #{sessionId}, sessionlimit = #{next} where email = #{uid}
mapper.select: select * from tbmember where sessionKey = #{value} and sessionlimit > now()
select email from tbmember where membername = #{membername} and celltel = #{celltel}
mapper.update: update tbmember set password=sha2(#{pw}, 256) where membername = #{membername} and celltel = #{celltel} and email = #{email}
update tbmember set emailcertificationyn = 1, withdrawalyn = '0' where email = #{email}
